#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  uint64_t raftId = GetRaftServer().site_id_;
  Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, received put operation for oid %d key %s value %s", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid, k, v);


  cout<<"swetha - put "<<k<<" "<<v<<endl;
  //submitting put operation to Raft
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index, term;
  auto baseS = std::static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool ok = GetRaftServer().Start(baseS, &index, &term);
  if(ok)
  {
    Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d :submitted put operation to Raft", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
  }
  else
  {
    Log_info("%d : %d is not leader", oid, raftId);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // waiting for Raft to complete agreement
  Log_info("%d : waiting for Raft to complete put agreement", oid);
  uint64_t counter = 0;
  while(counter < 30)
  {
    counter = counter + 1;
    Log_info("%d : oid counter : %d", oid, counter);
    if(processedOps.find(to_string(oid)) == processedOps.end())
    {
      // if oid is not yet processed, wait for 50ms
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d : oid is not yet processed, wait for 50ms", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
      Coroutine::Sleep(50000);
    }
    else
    {
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d : oid is found in processedOps", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
      Log_info("%d : returning success as oid is processed successfully", oid);
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }
  Log_info("%d : oid is not yet processed even after waiting for 1.5s, returning timeout", oid);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  //submitting append operation to Raft
  uint64_t raftId = GetRaftServer().site_id_;
  Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, received append operation for oid %d key %s value %s", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid, k, v);


  cout<<"swetha - append"<<k<<" "<<v<<endl;
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index, term;
  auto baseS = std::static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool ok = GetRaftServer().Start(baseS, &index, &term);
  if(ok)
  {
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d :submitted append operation to Raft", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
  }
  else
  {
    Log_info("%d : %d is not leader", oid, raftId);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // waiting for Raft to complete agreement
  Log_info("%d : waiting for Raft to complete append agreement", oid);
  uint64_t counter = 0;
  while(counter < 30)
  {
    counter = counter + 1;
    if(processedOps.find(to_string(oid)) == processedOps.end())
    {
      // if oid is not yet processed, wait for 50ms
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d : oid is not yet processed, wait for 50ms", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
      Coroutine::Sleep(50000);
    }
    else
    {
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d : oid is found in processedOps", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }
  Log_info("%d : oid is not yet processed even after waiting for 1.5s, returning timeout", oid);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  uint64_t raftId = GetRaftServer().site_id_;
  Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, received get operation for oid %d key %s", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid, k);


  cout<<"swetha - get "<<k<<endl;
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  //submitting get operation to Raft
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  uint64_t index, term;
  auto baseS = std::static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool ok = GetRaftServer().Start(baseS, &index, &term);
  if(ok)
  {
    Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d :submitted get operation to Raft", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
  }
  else
  {
    Log_info("%d : %d is not leader", oid, raftId);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // waiting for Raft to complete agreement
  Log_info("%d : waiting for Raft to complete get agreement", oid);
  uint64_t counter = 0;
  while(counter < 30)
  {
    counter = counter + 1;
    if(processedOps.find(to_string(oid)) == processedOps.end())
    {
      // if oid is not yet processed, wait for 50ms
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d : oid is not yet processed, wait for 50ms", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
      Coroutine::Sleep(50000);
    }
    else
    {
      Log_info("Raftid - %d,  Raft Status - %d, oid - %d : oid is found in processedOps", raftId, GetRaftServer().rs, oid);
      vector<string> result = processedOps[to_string(oid)];
      *v = result[1];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }
  Log_info("%d : oid is not yet processed even after waiting for 1.5s, returning timeout", oid);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  cout<<"swetha - cmd "<<v->data_[0]<<endl;
  string oid = v->data_[0];
  Log_info("%s : executing the command as it is committed on Raft", oid);
  string op = v->data_[1];
  string key = v->data_[2];
  string value = "";
  if(!op.compare("put")) 
  {
    value = v->data_[3];
    keyValueDB[key] = value;
    Log_info("%s : executed put command key %s value %s", oid, key, keyValueDB[key]);
  }
  else if(!op.compare("append")) 
  {
    value = v->data_[3];
    if(keyValueDB.find(key) == keyValueDB.end())
    {
      keyValueDB[key] = value;
    }
    else
    {
      string oldValue = keyValueDB[key];
      keyValueDB[key] = oldValue + value;
    }
    Log_info("%s : executed append command key %s value %s", oid, key, keyValueDB[key]);
    value = keyValueDB[key];
  }
  else if(!op.compare("get")) 
  {
    if(keyValueDB.find(key) == keyValueDB.end())
    {
      value = "";
      // what to do here?
    }
    else
    {
      value = keyValueDB[key];
      Log_info("%s : executed get command key %s value %s", oid, key, value);
    }
  }
  vector<string> result;
  result.push_back(key);
  result.push_back(value);
  processedOps[oid] = result;
  Log_info("%s : operation - %s, added oid to processed operations list key : %s value : %s", oid, op, key, value);


  cout<<"swetha - processed operation - "<<GetRaftServer().site_id_<<" "<<oid<<" - op "<<op<<" key "<<key<<" value "<<value<<endl;


}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
